metadata.title: CVE-2024-7102 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.4 prior to 17.5.0 which allows an attacker to trigger a pipeline asanother user under certain circumstances.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
